words.definition: An anniversary is a day that celebrates something from a past year.
words.example: My parents celebrated their 20th anniversary.

words.definition: Arithmetic is math.
words.example: I like arithmetic more than history.

words.definition: To be ashamed is to feel upset because you did something wrong.
words.example: He was ashamed of the bad grade he got.

words.definition: To burst is to suddenly break or open.
words.example: The GS the balloon burst when the girl touched it.

words.definition: A carpenter is a person who builds things with wood.
words.example: The GS the carpenter built a new table.

words.definition: Coal is a hard, black rock that you burn for heat.
words.example: The GS he put some more coal on the fire.

words.definition: A couch is a long, soft seat for more than one person.
words.example: The GS he sat on the couch to watch TV.

words.definition: When something drips, just a little bit of liquid falls from it.
words.example: I heard water dripping from the faucet.

words.definition: If something is elegant, it is very fancy and pleasing.
words.example: The GS she looked very elegant in her new dress.

words.definition: Fabric is cloth used to make things like clothes.
words.example: The GS the fabric of the shirt was very soft.

words.definition: Highlands are high areas of land, usually with many mountains.
words.example: The GS the family went on a trip to the highlands.

words.definition: Ivory is a white substance from the tusks of an elephant.
words.example: The GS the statue was made of ivory.

words.definition: A mill is a building where grain is made into flour.
words.example: The GS the old mill was built near the river.

words.definition: A needle is a small, sharp tool used for sewing.
words.example: The GS she used a needle to sew the button on.

words.definition: To polish something is to rub it in order to make it shiny.
words.example: The GS he polished his shoes.

words.definition: To sew is to put pieces of cloth together using a needle and thread.
words.example: The GS she is learning how to sew.

words.definition: A shed is a small building where you store things like tools.
words.example: We Gs put the lawnmower in the shed.

words.definition: A thread is a thin piece of string used for sewing.
words.example: The GS she used a blue thread to sew the shirt.

words.definition: To trim something is to cut a little bit off of it.
words.example: The GS he trimmed his hair.

words.definition: If something goes upwards, it moves vertically higher.
words.example: The GS the elevator moved upwards.
